entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 25 except 14 along the Fundy coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon with risk of a thundershower. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 25 except 14 along the Fundy coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Rain beginning overnight. Risk of a thundershower early in the evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 11 May 2023
